participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and organized, Emily enjoys a laid-back lifestyle and values her personal space for artistic expression.
participant_1.background: I need a space where I can be creative and have room for my art supplies. I do not drink alcohol. I want to make sure all my files are properly named and organized so I can find them easily when I need them. I like eating pretzels. My favorite place to eat is the local diner, where the staff knows my name and the food is delicious.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and caring, Michael balances a demanding job with a love for his pets and enjoys quiet moments at home.
participant_2.background: I've kept my wife's terminal cancer a secret from my parents because I don't want them to worry. I like to stay in and cuddle with my dog on rainy days. My cat is my most prized possession. I take a deep breath and sing my favorite song in the shower. I love to watch The Voice.

content.text: Hi how are you doing?
I am doing great! How about you?
I am doing well. I am just having a relaxing day at home.
That sounds nice. I am currently at work, but it is a slow day.
What do you do for a living?
I am a nurse.
Oh wow! I have a lot of respect for nurses.
Thank you! I am happy to do what I do.
I am sure your patients appreciate you.
I hope so! I try my best to help them.
What do you do for fun?
I like to stay in and cuddle with my dog on rainy days.
That sounds like a great way to relax.
It is! I also like to watch the voice.
I have never watched that show before.
You should! It is a great show.
I might have to check it out.
You should!
It sounds like a good show.
It is! I hope you like it.
